metadata.title: USN-7200-1 -- Roundcube vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Roundcube incorrectly handled certain file-based attachment plugins. An attacker could exploit this to gain unauthorized access to arbitrary files on the hostâ€™s file system.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7200-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm5 roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm5 roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm5 roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm5 roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm5 roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm5 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
